price: 不然，我使这些人和他们的祖先享受，直到真理和宣明的使者来临他们。
arabic: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡتُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَرَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: bal mattaʿtu hāulāi waābāahum ḥattā jāahumu al-ḥaqu warasūlun mubīnun
